game.name: GastroNomicon
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 인디, 전략, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The rogue lite book of cursed factory food! Demolish waves of angry vegetables, upgrade weapons, find random powerups, use tower defenses and basic factory-building mechanics through procedurally generated maps and levels as you unlock cursed pages to create the ultimate book of dead factory food.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The rogue lite book of cursed factory food! Demolish waves of angry vegetables, upgrade weapons, find random powerups, use tower defenses and basic factory-building mechanics through procedurally generated maps and levels as you unlock cursed pages to create the ultimate book of dead factory food.
